description: This is a front-end React component for a food order tracking application. It manages categories, menu items, shopping cart functionalities, and ordering process, using hooks and API calls.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component handling the food ordering front-end logic.

methods.name: addToCart
methods.description: Adds a menu item to the shopping cart, increasing quantity if already present.

methods.name: changeQty
methods.description: Changes the quantity of a specific cart item.

methods.name: removeFromCart
methods.description: Removes an item from the shopping cart.

methods.name: placeOrder
methods.description: Submits the current cart as a new order via API and handles loading/error states.
